data.title: Newark Airport EWR Shuttles & Private Transfers
data.meta_description: Book Now To Secure Your Low Price - Compare Reliable Newark Airport EWR Shared Shuttle Or Private Transfer Services - Multiple Quotes Available
data.text:
Visiting New York is always a buzz, and you’ll want to arrive in the Big Apple feeling relaxed and ready to soak up the atmosphere. Getting to destinations like Manhattan, Brooklyn or Queens can be a breeze with the right choice of Newark airport transportation options.

Navigate your way through New Jersey or on to New York with one of Jayride’s airport shuttle choices. Booking your preferred transport in advance will get you to your doorstep faster and you won’t be left trying to join up the tricky transport dots.

Jayride’s 23 professional airport transport services include private cars, limousines and shuttles. Making your way from Newark Airport to your hotel or private address couldn’t be easier. Just book and pay in advance and leave the rest to Jayride – one of our partner drivers will pick you up and drop you off at your choice of destination without a worry.

For many travelers, a ride from Newark Airport will mean you’ll be state-hopping from New Jersey to New York. But even if you're going to be based closer to home in Newark or elsewhere in New Jersey, choosing the right airport transportation is key. Jayride is the largest comparison website for airport transfers in the world.

One of the three main airports serving the New York city area, Newark Airport has 3:

Terminal A

Terminal B

Terminal C

The terminals are connected by the AirTrain monorail. Newark Airport has an extensive selection of shopping and dining options, and a comprehensive list of amenities.

Booking an EWR day pass to the airport's lounges is a good option if you want to just take it easy and lounge your way through your transit time without leaving your terminal.

Reliable airport transport services to and from Orlando Airport … easy. Whatever your budget, wherever you’re headed, Jayride partner drivers will get you there. Travel your way with a choice of affordable ground transportation options in Orlando Airport.

Shared shuttles

The best option for travel on a budget, share a ride in a car or van with others heading in your direction.

Private transfers

Choose a car, van or limo (why not!) and have your own private driver get you to your destination.

Rideshare

Use a familiar rideshare service without downloading local apps, and avoid surge pricing by booking ahead.

Cruise transfer

Book before you land at Orlando Airport and take the worry out of getting from the airport to Port Canaveral for your amazing Caribbean cruise.
